snippet.title: Empath | NEW Student Game Trailer Reveal | #USCGamesEXPO 2019
snippet.description:
Empath will be featured at USC Games' 2019 Expo on May 8th! 
https://empathgame.weebly.com/

At USC Games Expo 2019, prepare for the action-packed, virtual-reality RPG, Empath!  Built for the #Oculus, with some of the most advanced gestural controls in VR, Empath combines pulse-pounding combat, eye-popping visual effects, and gives power to the player as they become the hero of their own exciting adventure!

RSVP for USC Games Expo 2019!
http://jamcity.uscgamesexpo.com

✦✦

Visit us on our other socials!
▶Twitter: @uscgames 
▶Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/uscgames/
▶Instagram: @usc.games
▶Our Website: games.usc.edu

✦✦

ABOUT USC GAMES:
Recognized as the #1 game design program in North America by the Princeton Review, USC Games represents an exciting collaboration between the School of Cinematic Arts’ Interactive Media & Games Division and the Viterbi School of Engineering’s Department of Computer Science. Incorporating elements of design, artistry and engineering, USC Games offers an utterly unique educational experience for students, and serves as the launching pad for them to play significant roles in the game design field.
